Analyze this JavaScript function for security vulnerabilities:

Suspected vulnerabilities:
- XSS-DOM

Function code:
```javascript
function redirect(param) {{
    window.location = param;
}}
```

For each vulnerability found, respond in this exact format:
VULNERABILITY: [type from list above]
LINE: [relative line number within function]
DESCRIPTION: [brief explanation]
CONFIDENCE: [HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]

### RESPONSE:
VULNERABILITY: XSS-DOM
LINE: 2
DESCRIPTION: Unvalidated redirect using user-controlled location
CONFIDENCE: MEDIUM
